meanings.definition: People who sell goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The salespeople at the store were friendly and helpful.
meanings.sent2: The salespeople worked hard to meet their monthly targets.
meanings.sent3: The salespeople decided to have a dance-off to see who could sell the most.
meanings.sent4: The market was bustling with salespeople weaving through the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The image of the salespeople with their bright smiles stayed with me.

meanings.definition: A person who sells goods or services.
meanings.sent1: My neighbor is a salesperson who travels to different cities for work.
meanings.sent2: The salesperson recommended the best product for my needs.
meanings.sent3: The salesperson accidentally sold a vacuum cleaner to a ghost.
meanings.sent4: She was a salesperson by day, but a painter by night.
meanings.sent5: The salesperson's pitch was so convincing that I bought two!
